titleStmt.title: Iniunccions geue[n] by the moste excellent prince, Edward the sixte by the grace of God, kyng of England, Frau[n]ce, and Irelande: defendor of the faythe, and in earthe vnder Christ, of the churche of Englande and of Ireland the supreme hedde: to all and singuler his louyng subiectes, aswell of the clergie, as of the laietie.
Injunctions. 1547
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.

publicationStmt.publisher: The laste daie of Iulii, in the first yere of the reigne of our Sovereigne Lord King Edvvard the. VI. by Richard Grafton printer to His Most Royall Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Injunccions geven by the kynges majestie.
b4r has catchword: 'stament'; line 6 from bottom ends: 'thei'.
Identified as STC 10091 on UMI microfilm reel 11.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Union Theological Seminary Library (New York, N.Y.).
Appears at reel 11:5 (British Library copy), and at reel 1850:66 (Union Theological Seminary copy).

place.placeName: the first yere of the reigne of our Sovereigne Lord King Edvvard the. VI.
